message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob. I can do better than that. How about we meet at $115?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you do $108?
I'm getting close, Bob! I can do $112, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $109?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think we're getting close, though. How about we meet at $114?
I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you do $110?
I'm not willing to go back on my previous offer, Bob. I think we're at a stalemate. How about we meet in the middle at $111?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I think I'll have to pass on this one. I'll consider buying from John for $120 instead.
